decks.notes: This deck focuses on generating life gain and creature ramp to set up a powerful combo with Aetherflux Reservoir. By playing a mix of creatures that provide life gain, mana acceleration, and tutoring effects, the goal is to quickly assemble the pieces needed to cast Aetherflux Reservoir and then activate its ability to deal a large amount of damage to the opponent in one turn. The deck utilizes a variety of lands and spells to support this strategy, making it a formidable force in Pioneer 1 vs 1 matches.

This deck focuses on generating mana quickly with Lotus Field and using various untap effects to take multiple extra turns in a row, eventually leading to a game-winning combo or overwhelming advantage. The deck uses cards like Strict Proctor to disrupt opponents' plays and protect its own combos, while also having access to powerful tutor effects like Dark Petition and Fae of Wishes to find the right pieces at the right time. With strong card draw and resilience against counterspells, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents with its sheer power and consistency.

This deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with Arclight Phoenixes and utilizing spells like Consider, Opt, and Treasure Cruise to fuel their return to the battlefield. The inclusion of cards like Ledger Shredder and Picklock Prankster help to mill cards and trigger the Phoenix's ability. With a mix of cheap spells, card draw, and graveyard manipulation, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive plays and repeated attacks from the recurring Arclight Phoenixes.

This deck focuses on utilizing artifacts to quickly put pressure on the opponent and deal damage efficiently. Cards like Ensoul Artifact and Shrapnel Blast help power up artifacts like Darksteel Citadel and Smuggler's Copter to both attack and deal damage directly to the opponent. The deck also includes cards like Metallic Rebuke and Spell Pierce to protect its key creatures and disrupt the opponent's game plan. By using artifacts as its main source of damage and disruption, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and secure a quick victory.

The deck focuses on utilizing a variety of multicolored cards to control the game and generate card advantage, with Niv-Mizzet Reborn as the centerpiece. The inclusion of Bring to Light allows for flexibility in accessing key cards, while the companion Yorion, Sky Nomad provides additional value through flickering permanents. The deck also contains powerful removal spells, mana fixing, and ways to manipulate the opponent's hand and graveyard. Overall, the deck aims to outvalue opponents and establish control through a diverse array of spells and abilities.

The main concept of this Rakdos Aggro deck is to quickly and aggressively control the board with efficient removal spells and disruptive cards like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push, while also pressuring the opponent with an array of aggressive creatures like Vein Ripper and Bloodtithe Harvester. By utilizing cards like Sorin, Imperious Bloodlord and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse, the deck aims to maintain a strong board presence and continue to apply pressure on the opponent. Additionally, the deck includes disruptive cards like Preacher of the Schism and Duress to further disrupt the opponent's game plan.

This Spirit Aggro deck focuses on quickly building a board presence with low-cost spirits like Spectral Sailor, Mausoleum Wanderer, and Spell Queller. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan with cards like Spell Pierce and Get Lost while also taking advantage of buffs from cards like Supreme Phantom and Wedding Announcement. The inclusion of cards like Smuggler's Copter and Rattlechains help maintain card advantage and protect key creatures. The mana base is set up to consistently cast the deck's spells and support its aggressive strategy.

The main focus of this Mono Black Control deck is to disrupt your opponent's game plan through hand disruption (Duress, Thoughtseize), removal spells (Fatal Push), and card advantage (Waste Not, Liliana of the Veil). The deck aims to control the board with sweepers (Extinction Event), targeted removal (Reckoner Bankbuster), and powerful threats like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse. The deck also includes utility lands like Field of Ruin and Castle Locthwain to further disrupt your opponent's mana base and card advantage. The overall strategy is to grind out your opponent with powerful spells and efficient removal.

This deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with low-cost, aggressive creatures and burn spells. It aims to deal damage as quickly and efficiently as possible, utilizing cards like Monastery Swiftspear, Soul-Scar Mage, and Bonecrusher Giant to chip away at the opponent's life total. The deck also includes powerful enchantments like Rampaging Ferocidon and Eidolon of the Great Revel to punish opponents for playing spells. With a mix of creatures, burn spells, and powerful enchantments, this deck is designed to pressure the opponent and close out games swiftly.

This deck focuses on utilizing artifacts with aggressive strategies in order to quickly overwhelm the opponent. By enchanting artifacts like Darksteel Citadel with Ensoul Artifact, players can create powerful threats early in the game. Cards like Shrapnel Blast and Torch the Tower provide direct damage to finish off opponents quickly. The inclusion of cards like Smuggler's Copter and Combat Courier adds additional aggression and card advantage to keep the pressure on the opponent. Overall, the deck aims to be fast and relentless in its pursuit of victory.
